title: Sam Gowland savagely gets tattoo tribute of ex Chloe Ferry covered with growling animal
text:

Sam Gowland has had his tattoo tribute to Chloe Ferry covered up months after they finally ended their on and off again relationship for good.

The former Love Islander, 24, had the Geordie Shore babe's visage painted on his thigh which is now hidden underneath a new inking of a roaring bear.

Proving he is over his surgically-enhanced former flame, Sam took to Instagram on Thursday, to show off his new artwork, which he captioned: "Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending."

Sam first got the tattoo when he and Chloe, 24, appeared on MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us in November last year.

Chloe admitted that she decided on the design in order to stop Sam from being able to pull other girls.

(Image: xxxxxx/Instagram)

He was not happy with being branded with a picture of her face and asked: "Why the f**k did you do that for?"

It comes after Sam cropped Chloe out of a snap of a trip they took to Las Vegas when they were an item.

Sam posted the throwback snap onto Instagram which still revealed half of Chloe's arm wrapped around him, with the rest of her body completely cropped out.

He made no reference at all to his ex girlfriend in the caption, and instead penned that it's been a whole year since he watched the Conor McGregor versus Khabib fight - not mentioning she was by his side.

(Image: MTV)

(Image: instagram)

Sam flashed a beaming grin in the photo while wearing a smart suit as he enjoyed the fight with his then beau, and in his favourite throwback snap, he questioned where the time had gone.

Chloe and Sam's rollercoaster romance ended in disaster, as Sam called his Chloe a "compulsive liar" after she accused him of having sex with Love Island co-star Amber Davies just a day after they ended things.

Sam, who met Chloe after leaving the villa in 2017 and even joined her on Geordie Shore, has claimed Chloe has made up the claims after she said she discovered incriminating messages on his laptop.

(Image: Daniele Venturelli/WireImage)

The drama broke when Chloe tweeted a snarky message to Amber, who had posted a picture of herself captioned: "Looking at my boyfriend who doesn't yet know he’s my boyfriend x."

Chloe quote-tweeted it, adding: "Aye after you shagged mine!!"

The Geordie pair didn't hold back when it came to dishing out the dirt on social media, as it was publicised by them both.
description: The Love Island star previously had his ex's portrait inked onto his skin to prove his love for her
